allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Google Sign-In authentication

Add complete Google authentication flow using @react-native-google-signin library:
- Configure GoogleSignin with Web Client ID from environment
- Implement signWithGoogle\(\) with Firebase credential integration
- Add Portuguese error messages for sign-in states
- Connect Google buttons in login and register screens
- Handle Play Services availability check for Android

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $path 2>&1
Test-Path $path
")
